Class VBackupManager

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.util.backup.VBackupManager

public class VBackupManager
extends java.lang.Object

The Entry class for the user to use the vbackup utility through JVI.

Method Detail

backup

public void backup(BackupListener listener,
                   Options options)
Backups a database.

Parameters:
listener - BackupListener, to signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions while backing up the database.
options - Options, to pass the backup options.

restore

public void restore(RestoreListener listener,
                    Options options)
Restores database.

Parameters:
listener - RestoreListener, to signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions while restoring database.
options - Options, to pass the restore options.

startRollforwardArchiving

public void startRollforwardArchiving(StartRollforwardListener listener,
                                      Options options)
Starts rollforward archiving while backing up the database.

Parameters:
listener - RollforwardListener, to signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions while starting rollforward archiving.
options - Options, to pass rollforward options.

stopRollforwardArchiving

public void stopRollforwardArchiving()
Stops rollforward archiving while backing up the database.

DisableRollforwardArchiving

public void DisableRollforwardArchiving()
Disables rollforward archiving.

getBackupInformation

public java.util.Iterator getBackupInformation()
Provides information about the contents of backup file/s of the given database.

Returns:
Iterator Iterator on Backupinformation which stores level, volume etc information for each backup taken on the given database.

getListOfBackups

public DeviceInformation getListOfBackups(java.lang.String deviceName)
Lists the set of backups necessary to restore a database from the given deviceName.

Parameters:
deviceName - The device name on which backup has been done.
Returns:
DeviceInformation Stores the information of the device on which backup has been taken

getVBackupProgressStatus

public VBackupProgressStatus getVBackupProgressStatus()
Provides the status of the backup /restore process.

Returns:
VBackupProgressStatus It stores the backup /restore progress status such as mode of the vbackup, level of the vbackup process etc.
